DOC.brief_title: Understanding Fish Consumption Habits During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: Fish healthful food primary dietary source elongate n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFA ) , nutrients essential optimal neurodevelopment . Most pregnant woman US consume adequate n-3 PUFA . However , fish also may contaminate methylmercury , approximately 10 % woman childbearing age US mercury level higher recommend . Because food contains essential nutrient harmful contaminant , substantial confusion reign best course action pregnant woman . Additionally , clear fish consumption advice would effective change woman 's fish consumption habit . The goal pilot study perform formative work allow u develop refine intervention promote consumption fish low mercury high n-3 PUFA among pregnant woman . This project , together pilot RCT already fund , serve preliminary data support large RCT evaluate effect intervention pregnancy outcomes postpartum maternal infant health . Specific Aims Aim 1 . Among pregnant woman , identify : 1 ) knowledge potential risk benefit associate fish consumption pregnancy ; 2 ) awareness current recommendation fish consumption pregnant woman ; 3 ) source information learn health effect associate fish intake ; 4 ) facilitator barrier fish consumption , cost , availability , taste , habit . To achieve aim , conduct focus group pregnant woman Boston area infrequent consumer fish ( define < = 2 monthly fish serving ) . Aim 2 . Develop material plan intervention increase consumption fish high n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid low methylmercury among pregnant woman infrequent consumer fish baseline . We use result Aim 1 inform development material .
DOC.criteria: currently pregnant age least 18 year unable speak understand English consume 2 weekly fish serving unable eat fish ( e.g . allergy , dietary restriction )
